Sutton-in-Ashfield Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
sutton-in-ashfield-contest
None
Maritana [unknown arranger]
Sutton-in-Ashfield, Nottinghamshire
March contest 1st Lincoln Malleable, 2nd Swanwick Colliery.
Best euphonium, horn, trombone and flugal - Lincoln Malleable. Best cornet and soprano - Swanwick Colliery.
7 bands competed
3rd annual contest organised by Sutton-in-Ashfield Temperance Band
Sept. 30, 2012, 12:46 p.m. Sept. 30, 2012, 1:29 p.m.
